# ghstatus

Create a simple human readable table for readme that displays status of issues

## Installation

You can install ghstatus from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
remotes::install_github("yonicd/ghstatus")
```

```{r}
library(ghstatus)
```

```{r example}
ghstatus::get_issues(repo = 'r-lib/pkgdown',
           last = 20)%>%
  ghstatus::create_table()%>%
  knitr::kable()
```
